text: <@U02618EV1>, do you happen to have any info yet on the various image sizes you need for mobile/desktop?
I think <@U026AP8CM>  has a few of them that we looked into last week. Can we start there and then let me know what else is needed?
Sure. <@U026AP8CM> when you get the chance, would you let me know what you have?
Yes
<@U02613K0X>: you need the sizes?
yes
the sizes
the sizes that gaston needs the images to be for the desktop and mobile sites
okay looking it up
will send in a moment
okay thanks!
Eats desktop (645x164). Eats mobile (1280x650). Cocktails desktop (1280x354) Cocktails Mobile (1280x650).
Hope this helps
yep that helps. a couple questions though:
I’m assuming <@U02618EV1> will need @2x versions as well. These appear to be non-retina, correct?
Previously gaston said to use 1152 × 550 (non retina) for the philosophy video poster frame. can we confirm that this is still accurate?
And it looks like we’re missing sizes for the small circle-cropped images for the cocktails desktop page.
ok
just seeing this
catching up now
np
<@U02618EV1>: these sizes are for non-retina, correct?
<@U02618EV1>:  still use 1152 x 550 non retina for philosophy video poster frame?
Sorry, I missed this.
Those big images won't need a retina counterpart. They're already big.
do you mean all the images?
or just ones with 1280 width
Sorry about that let me double check something.
<@U026AP8CM> I know we touched on retina vs non-retina last week do you have anything on your notes? Just asking before I jump into the various PDSs to get that info.
I only have those sizes.
<@U02613K0X> <@U026AP8CM> will need to get those numbers again. Probably won't happen before out dev interview at 11.
not a problem.
another question i have unrelated to images: <@U026AP8CM> did we ever get endpoints for the remaining 4 tanks?
let me take another look to be sure, i don't believe we did.
looking now
cool thanks
still looking
so
from what i can tell, they should be set up. is that not the case?
do we still see 4 set up and null data for the remaining 4?
i have a separate endpoint for each of the four
that just returns an integer
but not for all 8?
no. it was in the most recent email you forwarded me regarding tanks

the very first email had two separate endpoint that returned lots of unexplained data that i needed directions for interpreting. then you relayed that in an email to small batch and they responded with four distinct urls for tanks 1-4
but nothing for 5-8
ok
so
the follow up email with the 4 distinct urls were only for the first 4 tanks
we need identical info. for 4 more tanks?
yes
okay
i'll let the client know.
thanks
<@U02613K0X>: would you mind doing me a favor when you get a chance

Keg Levels - 0D5YdIdNnmKS8M0WRv
Tank Levels– hdFTHgjLXgbHwzZkSS
client was given these two keys, which one is giving you data?
both
but they don't equal 8 tanks?
<@U02613K0X> I'm trying to upload cocktail images but the CMS is stuck on the "uploading" spinner.
Is this b/c of the sizes you need or something else?
i’m not sure
they’re certainly not wired up to make images the correct sizes though

<@U026AP8CM> I think I'm getting pretty close to having only enough time to complete the website with the scope we previously decided on. Do we have a sense for how are we going to incorporate changes from the client?
Eg: Eats page copy changes.
what do you mean
do you have a second to chat? <@U02618EV1>
<@U02613K0X> Looks like the cms/api is down.
yes i know
i’m working on it
it should be up in a few minutes
No worries. Just mentioning it in case this was news.
thanks
